author: Megan Armstrong
title: JJ Redick Says 76ers' Joel Embiid, Ben Simmons 'Can Fit Together, for Sure'
description: JJ Redick departed the  Philadelphia 76ers  for the  New Orleans Pelicans  last summer, but the 35-year-old guard believes that Ben Simmons and Joel Embiid can both stay in Philly...
content:
Mitchell Leff/Getty Images
JJ Redick departed the Philadelphia 76ers for the New Orleans Pelicans last summer, but the 35-year-old guard believes that Ben Simmons and Joel Embiid can both stay in Philly.
